includedAssets.title: Batman (1989)
includedAssets.synopsis: Tim Burton's noirish take on the comic book legend stars an unlikely but effective Michael Keaton as Bruce Wayne, aka the Caped Crusader, aka the Dark Knight (though perhaps not the darkest... ). Out go the camp gimmicks of the celebrated TV series and in comes Anton Furst's sublime Oscar-winning Gotham City set design and Jack Nicholson as a splendidly unhinged Joker. Kim Basinger provides smouldering love interest as reporter Vicki Vale and it all goes down to a funksome soundtrack by Prince.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael Keaton's Bruce Wayne takes on Jack Nicholson's villainous Joker. Gothic Gotham fantasy directed by Tim Burton.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Tim Burton's noirish take on the comic book legend stars an unlikely but effective Michael Keaton as Bruce Wayne, aka the Caped Crusader, aka the Dark Knight (though perhaps not the darkest... ). Out go the camp gimmicks of the celebrated TV series and in comes Anton Furst's sublime Oscar-winning Gotham City set design and Jack Nicholson as a splendidly unhinged Joker. Kim Basinger provides smouldering love interest as reporter Vicki Vale and it all goes down to a funksome soundtrack by Prince.

includedAssets.title: Batman Returns
includedAssets.synopsis: Tim Burton's dark and juicy sequel finds Michael Keaton's troubled superhero fighting off the mischievous attentions of Michelle Pfeiffer's super-sleek Catwoman and Danny DeVito's malevolent Penguin. Colder and deeper than the first reboot, Burton's gothic signature is all over this fantastical follow-up. Pfeiffer steals the show as the downtrodden secretary turned whip-cracking, PVC-clad sex kitten. Miiiaoww!
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Blockbuster action as Gotham braces itself for a showdown between caped crusader Michael Keaton, Michelle Pfeiffer's Catwoman and the Penguin.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Tim Burton's dark and juicy sequel finds Michael Keaton's troubled superhero fighting off the mischievous attentions of Michelle Pfeiffer's super-sleek Catwoman and Danny DeVito's malevolent Penguin. Colder and deeper than the first reboot, Burton's gothic signature is all over this fantastical follow-up. Pfeiffer steals the show as the downtrodden secretary turned whip-cracking, PVC-clad sex kitten. Miiiaoww!

includedAssets.title: Batman Forever
includedAssets.synopsis: Val Kilmer takes the batcape from Michael Keaton as Bruce Wayne/Batman in the late-20th century phase of the dark knight's cinematic journey. When psychotic criminals Two-Face (Tommy Lee Jones) and The Riddler (Jim Carrey) unite to cause mayhem in Gotham City, Batman hooks up with eager new partner Robin (Chris O'Donnell) to destroy their wicked union. Director Joel Schumacher takes the franchise in a brighter, breezier direction, with Carrey relishing his manic role and Nicole Kidman and Drew Barrymore adding zap to the starry cast.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Villains Jim Carrey and Tommy Lee Jones pose a deadly riddle for caped crusader Val Kilmer. Superhero adventure with Nicole Kidman.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Val Kilmer takes the batcape from Michael Keaton as Bruce Wayne/Batman in the late-20th century phase of the dark knight's cinematic journey. When psychotic criminals Two-Face (Tommy Lee Jones) and The Riddler (Jim Carrey) unite to cause mayhem in Gotham City, Batman hooks up with eager new partner Robin (Chris O'Donnell) to destroy their wicked union. Director Joel Schumacher takes the franchise in a brighter, breezier direction, with Carrey relishing his manic role and Nicole Kidman and Drew Barrymore adding zap to the starry cast.

includedAssets.title: Batman & Robin
includedAssets.synopsis: George Clooney takes over as Gotham City's chief villain-vanquisher in the fourth movie in the sequence kicked off by Tim Burton's Batman. With Chris O'Donnell rejoining the party as Robin and a slinky Alicia Silverstone as Batgirl, Gotham's crimefighting collective takes on Arnold Schwarzenegger's cold-quipping evil genius Mr Freeze and Uma Thurman's green-fingered villainess Poison Ivy (a role suggested for both Demi Moore and Sharon Stone). Director Joel Schumacher puts his trademark gloss on proceedings.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: George Clooney and Chris O'Donnell star in this rollicking adventure which pits them against Mr Freeze and Poison Ivy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: George Clooney takes over as Gotham City's chief villain-vanquisher in the fourth movie in the sequence kicked off by Tim Burton's Batman. With Chris O'Donnell rejoining the party as Robin and a slinky Alicia Silverstone as Batgirl, Gotham's crimefighting collective takes on Arnold Schwarzenegger's cold-quipping evil genius Mr Freeze and Uma Thurman's green-fingered villainess Poison Ivy (a role suggested for both Demi Moore and Sharon Stone). Director Joel Schumacher puts his trademark gloss on proceedings.

includedAssets.title: Batman Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: The Dark Knight and his trusty sidekicks Robin and Batgirl take on a host of classic foes to save Gotham from oblivion. Michael Keaton, Val Kilmer and George Clooney don the famous cape and cowl as billionaire turned crime fighter Batman in this hit series. Jack Nicholson, Danny DeVito, Michelle Pfeiffer, Tommy Lee Jones, Jim Carrey, Uma Thurman and Arnold Schwarzenegger also star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael Keaton, Val Kilmer and George Clooney don the cape and cowl as billionaire turned hero Batman in this hit series. Jack Nicholson also stars.

includedIn.title: Batman
includedIn.synopsis: Batman battles a host of his classic foes to save Gotham from oblivion in these pioneering blockbusters. The Dark Knight takes on the Joker, Penguin, Riddler, Two-Face, Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy, teaming up with his trusty sidekicks Robin and Batgirl.
